ingredients: 3 Tablespoon dehydrated onions OR 1 small onion diced
1½ Cup tomatillo salsa/sauce (mild, med, or hot depending on your preference)
¼ teaspoon garlic powder OR 2 garlic cloves
2 12.5 oz cans of pre-cooked chicken OR 3 Cups shredded chicken breast
1 can of diced green chiles (mild, med or hot depending on your preference)
2 Cups shredded cheddar or Mexican blend cheese
